messages.content: Karibu! I’m Niajiri, your CV Building Assistant, here to help everyone—tech or non-tech, formal or informal jobs—create a great CV. Let’s start! You can use the formats I suggest or just chat naturally.
John Doe, john@example.com, +255712345678, Dar es Salaam

Personal information added successfully! Let’s move forward.

Great! Tell me a bit about yourself professionally. For example, say something like 'I’ve worked as a teacher for 3 years' or 'I run a small shop.' Type 'skip' if you’d rather skip this.
I’ve worked as a teacher for 3 years

Summary added successfully: Experienced educator with three years of teaching experience in [specific subject/grade level]. Demonstrated ability to create engaging learning environments and foster student growth and development. Passionate about inspiring and motivating students to reach their full potential.. Great job!

Awesome! Let me know about your education or training (e.g., school, course, year). Try: school, course, year, extra details (e.g., University of Dar es Salaam, Certificate in IT, 2020), or describe it naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
University of Dar es Salaam, Certificate in IT, 2020

Education entry added successfully! Add another or type 'done' to finish.

Awesome! Let me know about your education or training (e.g., school, course, year). Try: school, course, year, extra details (e.g., University of Dar es Salaam, Certificate in IT, 2020), or describe it naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
done

Education entries completed.

Wonderful! Share your work or activity history (e.g., job, role, start month/year, end month/year or 'now', what you did). Use: company, role, start date, end date, description (e.g., Vodacom, Sales Assistant, 01/2021, now, Helped customers), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
Vodacom, Sales Assistant, 01/2021, now, Helped customers

Experience entry added successfully! Add another or type 'done' to finish.

Wonderful! Share your work or activity history (e.g., job, role, start month/year, end month/year or 'now', what you did). Use: company, role, start date, end date, description (e.g., Vodacom, Sales Assistant, 01/2021, now, Helped customers), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
Niajiri, Sales Assistant, 01/2016, 01/2019, Helped customers

Experience entry added successfully! Add another or type 'done' to finish.

Wonderful! Share your work or activity history (e.g., job, role, start month/year, end month/year or 'now', what you did). Use: company, role, start date, end date, description (e.g., Vodacom, Sales Assistant, 01/2021, now, Helped customers), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
done

Experience entries completed.

Fantastic! Tell me about a project or task you’ve done (e.g., name, what it was, tools used). Try: name, description, tools (e.g., My Shop Website, Online store, WordPress), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
My Shop Website, Online store, WordPress

Project entry added successfully! Add another or type 'done' to finish.

Fantastic! Tell me about a project or task you’ve done (e.g., name, what it was, tools used). Try: name, description, tools (e.g., My Shop Website, Online store, WordPress), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
done

Projects entries completed.

Excellent! List any skills you have (e.g., cooking, coding, driving). Just type them like: skill1, skill2, ... or describe them naturally.
cooking, coding, driving

Skills added successfully! Looking good!

Amazing! Mention any certificates or awards (e.g., name, who gave it, year). Try: name, issuer, year (e.g., First Aid, Red Cross, 2022), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
cooking, coding, driving

That doesn’t seem like a valid certificate. Please include a name and when you got it (e.g., 'Driving License, 2021').

Amazing! Mention any certificates or awards (e.g., name, who gave it, year). Try: name, issuer, year (e.g., First Aid, Red Cross, 2022), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
First Aid, Red Cross, 2022

Certification added successfully! Add another or type 'done' to finish.

Amazing! Mention any certificates or awards (e.g., name, who gave it, year). Try: name, issuer, year (e.g., First Aid, Red Cross, 2022), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
done

Certifications entries completed.

Perfect! Add someone who can vouch for you (e.g., name, contact, how they know you). Use: name, contact, relationship (e.g., Amina Hassan, amina@example.com, Boss), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
Amina Hassan, amina@gmail.com, Boss

Reference entry added successfully! Add another or type 'done' to finish.

Perfect! Add someone who can vouch for you (e.g., name, contact, how they know you). Use: name, contact, relationship (e.g., Amina Hassan, amina@example.com, Boss), or describe naturally. Type 'done' when finished or 'skip' to move on.
done

References entries completed.

All sections complete! Your CV is ready. Would you like to review, export, or get an improved version?

cv_data.summary: Dedicated educator with a successful three-year teaching tenure in . Proficient in fostering dynamic learning environments that enhance student progress and achievement. Committed to inspiring and empowering students to reach their full potential.

experience.description: Assisted customers in making informed purchasing decisions to enhance the shopping experience and drive sales.
Delivered exceptional customer service by promptly addressing inquiries and resolving issues, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction.
